Writer: Rob Sprackling (story), Johnny Smith (story), Andy Riley (story), Kevin Cecil (story), Kelly Asbury (story), Steve Hamilton Shaw (story), Andy Riley (screenplay), Kevin Cecil (screenplay), Mark Burton (screenplay), Emily Cook (screenplay), Kathy Greenberg (screenplay), Steve Hamilton Shaw (screenplay), Kelly Asbury (screenplay), Rob Sprackling (original screenplay), Johnny Smith (original screenplay), William Shakespeare (play)
Title: Gnomeo & Juliet
Actors: James McAvoy, Emily Blunt, Ashley Jensen, Michael Caine
Plot: The neighboring gardens of Montague and Capulet are at war, but the gnomes, Gnomeo and Juliet, are in love.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 10 nominations.
